# snyk Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "snyk" {
  group_id = "GROUP_ID" # can also provide in env as SNYK_API_GROUP
  api_key  = "API_KEY"  # can also provide in env as SNYK_API_KEY
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **api_key** (String, Sensitive)
- **group_id** (String)
